message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. It's truly one-of-a-kind and I know it would be a valuable asset to you. Given its unique value, I'm offering it to you for $1,600,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $1,600,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for this product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your perspective on the value, my original offer reflects the true worth and potential of this product. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still too high for me. I'm happy to meet you in the middle at $1,000,000, which I believe is a fair compromise considering both our perspectives on the value of the product.
